title: Greate Check-Out Experience
description: Attract more clients and keep them loyal by offering a smooth payment experience during checkout.

title: Instant Payments
description: Enjoy accepting instant payments from your clients with multiple payment methods.

title: Auto Payment
description: Automate recurring payments from your clients with their stored payment option details.

title: Flexible Integration
description: PayWay offers a variety of integration options to suit your business needs and technical capabilities.

title: Secure
description: Using data encryption, 3DS 2.0 protocol and rules based fruad detection.

title: 24/7 Support
description: Our support team is available 24/7 via phone, email or live chat.
